mapper.insert: insert into customer_service(cs_title, cs_content, cs_writer, cs_category, cs_secret) values (#{csTitle}, #{csContent}, #{csWriter}, #{csCategory},) #{csSecret})
mapper.update: update customer_service set csTitle= #{csTitle} where cs_no = #{csNo}
update customer_service set cs_view= cs_view + 1 where cs_no =#{csNo}
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by cs_no desc)as cs_id, cs.* from customer_service cs where cs.cs_category=#{category1}) cs2 where cs2.cs_id between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from customer_service where cs_category=#{category1}
select count(*) from customer_service where cs_title like concat('%', #{search1}, '%')
